captions.text: Hello
Hello, who's it?
Dev..Deva!
How shameless of you to call me again!
Remember one thing... whatever you do, I won't be yours!
You'll die a cruel death...
Hi Deva!... How come you're here?
Deva...I asked you something
I've been waiting for you
For me? And Here? Why?
To Talk!
But why so? Have they prohibited talking at college?
No. But, I gotta talk to you here only Anjali
Deva, You're sounding so different today!
Why? Are you feeling weird?

I mean, you were a silent chap!
Suddenly, the way you're talking today..
But this Silence is not helping me sort out issues
Boss, are you the one who called me?
Get In
Your face seems familiar to me
Are you from Siddhartha College?
You could've mentioned that on the call, boss!

So, tell me, what's the matter?
 Why did you want to meet me?
Hello Brother, I asked you
Why hurry into it brother!
You'll get to know in some time...
Huh, I can't be that patient, answer my questions
Shit!
You bastard!
Sorry boss, I was frustrated coz no one gave a lift
Where do you have to go?
Can you drop me to a nearby bus stop?
Neaby... there are only dhabas, no bus stops till 3-4km
If you don't mind, can you drop me till there
Okay, let's go
By the way, You didn't answer where you have to go?
Hyderabad
Where in Hyderabad?
On what work?
Hello Boss... I'm asking you
What do I answer when you're interrogating me like a cop
Are you a police man?
Well guessed! Even in the abscene of a khaki uniform.
I can't understand what you're saying...
But I guess want to share something. Isn't it?
Yes
Okay, so tell me fast what is it
Why fast? This is not something I can hurry into
Then, let me know at college. I gotta go
Anjali, wait
I Love You Anjali
What? I hope you're not joking
Have I ever joked with you?
All these days, you've been a friend and now suddenly...
Can't a friend fall in love?
Sorry, I don't love you
But why?
I love my cousin
Boss, why did you want to meet me?
Or you want me to stop the car?
You're Anjali's cousin, right?
So?
Forget Her!
What?
Forget Anjali!
Who the hell are you?
Whoever I am, just listen to what I say!
You're Deva?
(Grins) So She's told you quite a bit about me!
Boss, you are in a one-sided love. Where as we both love each other
Moreover, she's my cousin and our marriage is fixed
I'm not scared of your warnings. Please get down
(gasps) hey...
Your name?
What's in a name anyway?
And your city?
Nameless and homeless, What do you do on these roads?
I stop every passing by vehicle and ask for a lift, that's my hobby!
Oh!
Stop here, I'll get down
There's no bus stop here yet
Never mind, I'll get down
Ok
Thanks
Just a minute
This one's for you!
What is it?
Gift!
I gift the ones who ride on my bike, that's my hobby!
You thought I wouldn't identify you?
Deva, stop there!
Why din't you tell me earlier?
'I love my cousin", you want me to wear that tag & roam around?
Why din't you tell me directly?
Stop asking stupid questions
Tell me, is our friendship that close for me to tell you anything directly
Hi, Bye or Books is what we talk about. Never got into personals
I can't discuss my personal life with every other guy
I'm very sorry for being rude but I have to say this
Our marriage is fixed, so stop discussing this
Then what about me?
Why do you ask me? Did you ask me before loving me?
So you wan't me to abandon my life?

You're asking such irritating questions!
As if I betrayed you in love!
Do you know how much I love you?
Do you know how much we love each other?
I don't want to know

Exactly! We're getting married this summer.
I don't need to discuss this with you.Bye
Leave me

It won't take a minute to kill you.
If you want me to leave you, you have to leave Anjali
You think she'll be yours if you killed me? Think for a while...
There's nothing to think about. Until I throw you out of my way, she won't be mine
Whatever you do, Anjali won't love you
Then I'll see to it that no one else should love her either
Deva, I know where you're heading to..I warn you to surrender!
Deva, Love would never kill someone. If it kills, then it's not love
Will you marry him even after his death?
What did you say?
Will you marry him ... even after his death?
Hey Police, Yes! I'm heading towards her
Beauty that can't be mine must melt down!
Anyone who obstructs my love must burn down!
Acid! My hands are unable to bear it!
How do you even think of pouring it on her face?
Men like you should be shot immediately
You don't have the right to kill me
Arrest me if you want

You take the right to
kill other humans but I

can't have the right to
kill a beast like you?

title: Inhuman || Telugu Latest Short Film 2015 || Presented By Runway reel

comments.text:
Good to see your video friends, Please take 2 mins... I wanted to share my 
musical reaction to the Delhi incident. A short tune from my heart as a 
tribute to Damini. It is interesting to note that a social betterment 
message like this (not entertainment category) is going viral on YouTube. 
You can add to the effect by sharing! watch/share in/from my channel 
Regards, Ashwin Palaparthi, Music composer.
